# MTLFunctionStitchingFunctionNode

**Class**

A call graph node that describes a function call and its inputs.

## Declaration

```swift
class MTLFunctionStitchingFunctionNode
```

## Overview

When the Metal device object evaluates the function graph to compile the stitched function, it evaluates the nodes stored in the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLFunctionStitchingFunctionNode/arguments] property that it hasn’t already evaluated, and then calls the function specified by [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLFunctionStitchingFunctionNode/name] to generate the node’s output.

If the function has side effects on the input data, use the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLFunctionStitchingFunctionNode/controlDependencies] property on other nodes to specify whether the Metal device object needs to evaluate this node first.

## Initializing a function node

- **init(name:arguments:controlDependencies:)**: Creates a new function node.

## Configuring a function node

- **name**: The name of the function to call.
- **arguments**: An ordered list of the nodes that provide the function’s arguments.
- **controlDependencies**: The list of nodes that need to execute before executing the node.

## Stitched function libraries

- **Customizing shaders using function pointers and stitching**: Define custom shader behavior at runtime by creating functions from existing ones and preferentially linking to others in a dynamic library.
- **MTLStitchedLibraryDescriptor**: A description of a new library of procedurally generated functions.
- **MTLFunctionStitchingGraph**: A description of a new stitched function.
- **MTLFunctionStitchingInputNode**: A call graph node that describes an input to the call graph.
- **MTLFunctionStitchingNode**: A protocol to identify call graph nodes.
- **MTLFunctionStitchingAttributeAlwaysInline**: An attribute to specify that Metal needs to inline all of the function calls when generating the stitched function.
- **MTLFunctionStitchingAttribute**: A protocol to identify types that customize how the Metal compiler stitches a function together.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- MTLFunctionStitchingNode
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
